page.title: 09Monckton Coke & Chemical Co.
page.content: The Coke and Chemical Company started in 1873.The Coke and Chemical Company make these chemicals:gas,tar, crude benzol and coke. They produce 190,000 tonnes of coke a year. The coke is used for fires and boilers. Some of the coke goes to Cheshire where it is used in lime kilns.Some goes to homes for fires and boilers and some is sent overseas. The chemicals are sent to Scunthorpe and North wales. There is a pipeline which takes gas straight to factories in Barnsley. 190 people work here they are mostly local people.
